articles.description: Listen to BBC Radio 5 Live commentary and follow live text as England face North Macedonia in their final Euro 2024 qualifier.
articles.title: Euro 2024 qualifier: Lewis makes England debut v North Macedonia - radio & text

articles.description: Live text and audio coverage of Northern Ireland's final Group H qualifier as they host Denmark in the National Stadium at Windsor Park.
articles.title: Euro 2024 qualifier: Northern Ireland v Denmark - radio & text

articles.description: The World Cup ended how it began, with a sense of emptiness in Ahmedabad, and now the challenge is to breathe life into the tournament for 2027, says Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: 'Cricket World Cup should be enjoyed, not endured'

articles.description: The vehicle Hannes Strydom was travelling in collided with a minibus taxi, local media report.
articles.title: Hannes Strydom: Ex-South Africa rugby star dies in car crash

articles.description: Watch Tyreek Hill of Miami Dolphins 'rocket in' a touchdown, alongside a one-handed catch from the Arizona Cardinals' Deandre Hopkins.
articles.title: 'Kiss him goodbye!' Miami's Hill stars in NFL best plays

articles.description: Benjamin Mendy is taking former club Manchester City to an employment tribunal over millions of pounds he claims he is owed in unauthorised wage deductions.
articles.title: Mendy launches multi-million claim against Man City

articles.description: Sir David Brailsford is set to be on the three-man committee running the football operations of Manchester United, but who is he and what could it mean for the club?
articles.title: What will 'marginal gains' guru Brailsford bring to Man Utd?

articles.description: Watch highlights as Manchester City win the derby 3-1 at Old Trafford in front of a record 43,615 crowd for a Manchester United WSL game.
articles.title: Highlights: Man City win at Old Trafford in front of 43,000 crowd

articles.description: Police are investigating after former England international Ugo Monye accuses a supporter of racist abuse at Exeter's game with Gloucester.
articles.title: Police investigate Monye's racism claim at Exeter

articles.description: Phil Taylor will retire from competitive darts for the second time after the 2024 World Senior Darts Tour.
articles.title: Sixteen-time world champion Taylor to retire in 2024
